text:
Accuen (http://www.accuenmedia.com/)| San Francisco (ONSITE)

We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing Engineering Team. The ideal candidate will have a keen interest in shipping code quickly and working on all parts of the stack including ETLâ€™s and background/long running jobs. Our technology stack includes Python, Django, AWS, Git, Jenkins. You will have the opportunity to evaluate new technologies and use them to design better and more reliable systems. Experience with our stack is a bonus, but we will train outstanding candidates.
